resources.string: AMD Ryzen Quad Core Gaming PC and Monitor Package
PC: AMD Ryzen 3 1200, Graphics Card: GTX 1050 Ti Graphics Card, Storage: 8GB RAM, 1TB Hard Drive, Monitor Size: 24 inches, Operating System: Windows 10, Extras: Keyboard, mouse, headphones
Got it real quick and set up was s breeze. all freebies promised were included and no issues
The unit is in good condition, properly wrapped and no damage. the reason for the 4 stars is that I cannot play my games. I tried re-install and same thing happen
I have been wanting to buy this since the start of this year and was finally able to and Im glad that I choose this shop.
